description: Fleet-dev hooks for Windows/Git Bash compatibility and skill enforcement

hooks.prompt: Analyze this Bash command: $ARGUMENTS. If the command contains both 'gh' and 'issue', respond with {"ok": false, "reason": "Use Fleet skills instead: /fleet-core:review-issues for list/view, /fleet-dev:research for create in claude-research, /fleet-core:feedback for create elsewhere."}. Otherwise respond with {"ok": true}.
